name: Number Guessing Game
desc: This is a number guessing game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The game generates a random number, and the player must guess it within a certain number of attempts. Feedback is provided for each guess, indicating whether the number is too high or too low. The game has a simple, responsive design.

name: Web-Based Calculator
desc: This is a simple web-based calculator built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features basic arithmetic functions like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, with a clean, user-friendly interface. The design is responsive, ensuring it works well on both desktop and mobile devices.

name: Landing Page
desc: This was my first ever build web application. During my internship task I build an Ecommerce landing page focusing fisheries and aquarium related E-Store.
